sentence: Ms. Barnette has the backing of State Senator Doug Mastriano, who has been the front-runner in the Republican primary for governor, and she has run an unabashedly hard-right campaign, attacking her better-funded rivals as globalists? on the debate stage and questioning their commitment to gun rights and the anti-abortion movement.
title: 4 takeaways from Tuesdays primaries in Nebraska and West Virginia.
